name: Workflow Manager - Full Frontend Diagnostic & Repair
description: Perform a full frontend functional audit. Test all buttons, routes, click handlers, API calls, forms, uploads and interactive components. Fix any non-working functionality and ensure full Playwright coverage.

userStories.title: Audit all frontend routes
userStories.description: Verify that all routes render correctly and load without runtime errors.
acceptanceCriteria: All routes render without blank screen

userStories.title: Test all buttons and click handlers
userStories.description: Programmatically test every button in the application and verify correct behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking buttons triggers expected state change or API call
No button click results in silent failure

userStories.title: Validate all API integrations
userStories.description: Ensure frontend communicates correctly with backend endpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: All fetch/axios calls hit correct backend endpoint

userStories.title: Fix non-working forms
userStories.description: Validate and repair all forms including uploads and settings.

userStories.title: Fix document upload flow
userStories.description: Ensure file upload component works fully.
acceptanceCriteria: Uploaded document appears in UI list

userStories.title: Verify state management consistency
userStories.description: Ensure React state updates correctly after user interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: UI updates immediately after API success

userStories.title: Add comprehensive Playwright coverage
userStories.description: Create or update Playwright tests to simulate real user interactions.

userStories.title: Detect and fix runtime errors
userStories.description: Scan application for JS runtime errors and fix root causes.

userStories.title: Implement global error handling
userStories.description: Add robust error handling for async operations.
acceptanceCriteria: All async calls wrapped in try/catch

userStories.title: Final functional verification
userStories.description: Perform full end-to-end verification of the entire frontend.
